page.title: 07THE LOCAL BIKE SHOP
page.content: Many local people rely on bikes for their personal transport. There has been a cycle repair shop at the end of Hawton Lane,Balderton for over 40 years. Mr.Jarman the present owner has been there 6 years. The shop is well situated at the junction of 2 main roads. Although he does sell new and second hand bikes the bulk of his work is repairing,reconditioning and servicing cycles. The relatively new craze of BMX riding did bring a slight increase in trade but the most popular bike is the traditional model. Having been in the two wheeled trade for over 20 years Mr. Jarman realised his ambition to own a cycle shop and was quite happy with his lot.
